meaningMnemonic: If you have a <radical>big</radical> <radical>mouth</radical> but a good <radical>heart</radical>, people will recognize your <kanji>kindness</kanji>. Even if you blabber on with your big mouth, as long as everyone knows that your heart is filled with kindness, they will love and accept you.
readingMnemonic: To further show your <kanji>kindness</kanji>, you chop up some <reading>on</reading>ions (おん) for a friend who always cries when they chop onions. The onions make you cry too, so it’s a nice act of kindness that you’re toughing it out for your pal.
